Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Serious
title: What happened to Yahoo Serious?
text:
Yahoo Serious: Whatever happened to the Young Einstein star? Mathew Murphy and Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Yahoo Serious: Whatever happened to the Young Einstein star? Mathew Murphy and Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Serious subject ... Yahoo Serious in the film Young Einstein. Picture: Supplied 
AN AUSTRALIAN friend of mine here in New York recently went on a date with an American who wanted an answer to a burning question — whatever happened to Yahoo Serious? 
“That is a question no Australian has asked in 20 years,” my friend informed her date. 
It appears that Young Einstein , the 1988 hit movie written, directed and starring Serious, was played on high rotation here in the US and the actor even appeared on the cover of Time magazine. Big time ... Yahoo Serious on the cover of Time magazine. Picture: Time Married ... Yahoo Serious with then-wife, Lulu. Picture: Supplied Beloved ... Yahoo Serious in a scene from 1988 film Young Einstein. Picture: Supplied Short hair, don’t care ... The most recent picture of Yahoo Serious, from 2007, with then-wife, Lulu, at the Sydney Opera House for opening night of Pirates of Penzance. Picture: Supplied Iconic scene ... Yahoo Serious in Young Einstein. Most people would remember this scene if not the entire movie. Picture: Supplied 1 of n 
Serious tried the same formula that worked for Young Einstein in Reckless Kelly , which came out in 1993, but failed to capture the same audience as his first film. Then in 2000 came the largely forgettable film, Mr Accident . 
Serious, who was born Greg Pead but changed his name in 1980, has largely fallen off the radar. 
So what has he been doing in the time since? Other Stories
